name: LET IT ALL OUT
description:
What would you do in this shitty situation? Make your choice. 

CHOOSE WISELY.

This is a super short point and click game, made for 2 days, and this game has all 4 endings.

I JUST ADD A LITTLE TASTE: THERE"S AN EASTER EGG. FIND IT.

CONTROLS

  • MOUSE - MOVE LEFT TO RIGHT JUST LIKE FNAF FRANCHISE.
  • R - RESTART
  • ESC - RETURN TO THE MENU
  • THERE'S ONE ENDING THAT YOU CAN MOVE WITH ARROW KEYS and SPACE BAR.
